explains: adj. 贪婪的，贪心的；贪吃的，嘴馋的；渴望的

sentences.en: Edith was seen as a conniving, greedy woman.
sentences.cn: 伊迪丝被认为是个与人共谋和贪婪的女人。

sentences.en: He attacked greedy bosses for awarding themselves big raises.
sentences.cn: 他攻击那些给自己大幅涨工资的贪婪的老板们。

sentences.en: These guys destroyed the company. They're all a bunch of greedy pigs.
sentences.cn: 这些家伙毁了公司。他们是一群贪婪的猪。
